mapper.select: select r.seq as seq, r.seqbook as seqbook, r.title as title, r.content as content, r.star as star, r.readcnt, r.recommendcnt, r.thread, r.depth, b.bookdate as bookdate from tblReview r inner join tblBook b on r.seqbook=b.seq where b.seqmember=#{seqMember} order by r.seq desc

select r.seq as seq, r.title as title, r.content as content, r.star as star, m.id as id, b.bookdate, r.readcnt, r.recommendcnt, r.thread, r.depth from tblReview r inner join tblBook b on b.seq=r.seqbook inner join tblMember m on m.seq=b.seqmember where seqbnb=#{seq} and r.secret=0 order by r.seq desc

select r.seq as seq, r.seqbook as seqbook, r.title as title, r.content as content, r.star as star, r.readcnt, r.recommendcnt, r.thread, r.depth, b.bookdate as bookdate from tblReview r inner join tblBook b on r.seqbook=b.seq where r.seq=#{seq}
select seq, seqreview, image, orgimage from tblReviewPic where seqreview=#{seq}
select image from tblReviewPic where seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update tblReview set title=#{title}, star=#{star}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
update tblReview set readcnt=readcnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
update tblReview set recommendcnt=recommendcnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
